title: Grand Theft Auto - San Andreas PC
description:
Grand Theft Auto - San Andreas PC
 
https://extraimago.com/images/2016/06/28/5df872e931a02b6cc816e0052f1e4234.png

Five years ago, Carl Johnson escaped from the pressures of life in Los Santos, San Andreas, a city tearing itself apart with gang trouble, drugs and corruption. Now, itâ€™s the early 90â€™s. Carlâ€™s got to go home, but his family has fallen apart and his childhood friends are heading towards disaster. To make matters worse, he's just been framed for homicide. CJ is forced on a journey that takes him across the entire state of San Andreas, to save his family and to take control of the streets.

1. Extract the Archive
2. Run gta_sa.exe and you are DONE :D

Else you can optionally (NO NEED TO DO THESE STEPS)
1. Move GTA San Andreas to C:Program FilesRockstar Games*GTA San Andreas Folder Here*
(SO IT'S LIKE YOU ACTUALLY INSTALLED THE GAME, CREATE THE FOLDER "ROCKSTAR GAMES")
2. Make gta_sa.exe shortcut on your desktop or on your games folder

System Requirements
CPU:	Intel Pentium 4 or AMD Athlon XP Processor
RAM:	384MB of RAM (the more the better!)
VGA:	128MB (or greater) Video Card (Geforce 6 Series Recommended)
DX:	DirectX 9
OS:	Windows 2000 or Windows XP
HDD:	4.7GB of free hard disk space (full install)
Sound:	DirectX 9 compatible Sound Card (Sound Blaster Auidgy 2 Recommended)
ODD:	16-Speed DVD-ROM drive
Recommended peripheral:	Keyboard & Mouse Gamepad with twin axis analog controls
